content: ever wanted to wear your granny stripes this colorful hood with cowl is designed to brighten any winter wardrobe stay warm look fab pattern includes three sizes toddler child adult materials medium 4 weight yarn size i-9 5 5mm crochet hook tapestry needle pattern is written in english using standard us/american crochet terms with step-by-step color-coded instructions and photos to help guide your hook to completion ************** ♥ ************** see more pretty patterns ➳ here 1 you are welcome to sell what you make using my patterns please include a link or reference to my shop www etsy com/shop/thehatandi for the pattern pattern is copyright protected it should not be reproduced redistributed or displayed publicly in any way join me on facebook ➳ the hat & i 2 1 http //www ravelry com/designers/marken-of-the-hat--i 2 https //www facebook com/thehatandi
